error: unexpected `stream` modifier on group definition
  --> testdata/parser/def/prefixes.proto:22:5
   |
22 |     stream group foo = 10 {}
   |     ^^^^^^
  help: delete it
   |
22 | -     stream group foo = 10 {}
22 | +     group foo = 10 {}
   |
   = help: `stream` only applies to an input or output of a service method

  --> testdata/parser/def/prefixes.proto:24:5
   |
24 |     export repeated int32 x = 1;
   |     ^^^^^^
  help: delete it
   |
24 | -     export repeated int32 x = 1;
24 | +     repeated int32 x = 1;
   |

   |
26 |     repeated oneof y {
   |     ^^^^^^^^
  help: delete it
   |
26 | -     repeated oneof y {
26 | +     oneof y {
   |
   = help: `repeated` only applies to a message field

  --> testdata/parser/def/prefixes.proto:32:1
   |
32 | stream extend Foo {
   | ^^^^^^
  help: delete it
   |
32 | - stream extend Foo {
32 | + extend Foo {
   |
   = help: `stream` only applies to an input or output of a service method

   | ^^^^^^^^
